list_definition.definition: a hard object which grows (usually in pairs) on the head of a cow, sheep etc
the material of which this is made

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The spoons are made of horn

list_definition.definition: something which is made of horn

list_definition.mean_english: vật có hình dáng giống sừng động vật
list_definition.definition: something which looks like a horn in shape
the apparatus in a car etc which gives a warning sound
an instrument, formerly an animal’s horn but now made of brass, that is blown to produce a musical sound
(also French horn) the type of coiled brass horn that is played in orchestras etc.
